Sentence.value: Ethylene glycol is a colorless, odorless, sweet-tasting chemical.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Ethylene glycol|C0015083]] is a colorless, odorless, sweet-tasting [[chemical|C0220806]].

Sentence.value: Ethylene glycol may be swallowed accidentally, or it may be taken deliberately in a suicide attempt or as a substitute for drinking alcohol (ethanol).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Ethylene glycol|C0015083]] may be swallowed accidentally, or it may be taken deliberately in a [[suicide attempt|C0038663]] or as a substitute for drinking alcohol (ethanol).
